Sentence: The therapeutic efficacy of bivalirudin can be decreased when used in combination with ibuprofen.
ibuprofen may increase the anticoagulant activities of bivalirudin.
The therapeutic efficacy of ibuprofen can be increased when used in combination with l-isoleucine.
The therapeutic efficacy of bivalirudin can be decreased when used in combination with aspirin.
aspirin may increase the anticoagulant activities of bivalirudin.
The therapeutic efficacy of aspirin can be increased when used in combination with l-isoleucine.
The therapeutic efficacy of aspirin can be decreased when used in combination with l-isoleucine.
The therapeutic efficacy of bivalirudin can be decreased when used in combination with paracetamol.
paracetamol may increase the anticoagulant activities of bivalirudin.
The therapeutic efficacy of paracetamol can be increased when used in combination with l-isoleucine.
The therapeutic efficacy of paracetamol can be decreased when used in combination with l-isoleucine.
